channel.title: Length Restrictions on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Length Restrictions on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-95 north approaching OR-78. Weight restrictions on US-395 northbound traffic between Mt Vernon and Pilot Rock. OR-78 is the only connecting highway into central Oregon from US-95, and connects to US-20 and US-395 in Burns.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching OR-78 - Length Restrictions
item.description: US-95 north approaching OR-78. Length restrictions on US-395 north traffic ahead. OR-78 is the only road that connects US-95 with the rest of Oregon. OR-78 connects US-95 with US-20/US-395 in Burns.
